metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5340 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.x before 2.8.9, and 2.9.xbefore 2.9.3 does not consider the moodle/badges:viewbadges capability,which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive badgeinformation via a request involving (1) badges/overview.php or (2)badges/view.php.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
